bars_scale_desc: Scale of the complete bars hud
background_alpha_desc: Transparency of the background line behind the bars
hide_in_stealth_desc: Hide the arcs when in stealth
always_show_when_hurt_desc:
Always show the arcs when hurt, even if in stealth
(does nothing when the above option is disabled)
hide_when_full_desc: Hide the arcs when armor and health is full
hide_when_armor_full_desc: Hide the arcs when armor is full, disregarding health
frenzy_relative_desc: Show the 30% of frenzy as 100% when frenzy is skilled
hide_at_frenzy_cap_desc:
Already hide at 30% when frenzy is skilled
(does nothing when the above option is enabled)
fade_out_time_desc: Time of the fade out animation when the arcs get hidden due to one of the above settings
show_armor_timer_desc: Show regular armor regeneration cool down timer on bottom of the armor arc
show_anarchist_timer_desc: Show anarchist armor regeneration cool down timer on bottom of the armor arc
swan_song_intensity_desc: Set the intensity of the blue swan song effect
chico_injector_intensity_desc: Set the intensity of the orange kingpin injector effect
